item.title: (2017) Wandering Dragon Game Elements
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
Wandering Dragon Game Elements

Wandering Dragon is a vertical platformer inspired by Leap Day. It was one of the 3 game in Project Trinity.

I was only involved in the very early alpha stage of this game, created the game title and a few simple assets on the very first alpha version of the game.

Client

Punch Entertainment Vietnam

Project Date

2017

Category

Graphic Design · Logo/Branding · Mobile

Share This

item.title: (2018) Mộc Tiên Collagen
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
Collagen Mộc Tiên

Another product line released under the Mộc Tiên Herbal brand. I created brand logo, tin box and the small pouch label.

Client

BIBABO

Project Date

2018

Category

Graphic Design · Logo/Branding · Printed Media

item.title: (2018) DiChung.vn Mobile App Prototype
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
Dichung.vn Mobile App (prototype)

A while ago I was approached by a person from Dichung.vn for the position of Lead UI/UX department. While I didn’t take the job, I find it intriguing to create a design for a mobile app version of their service (they don’t have a mobile presence yet)

Please note that this particular version is an unsolicited redesign

Client

Dichung.vn

Project Date

Aug 2018

Category

Graphic Design · Logo/Branding · Mobile · User Interfaces

Share This

View Project

item.title: (2018) Lợi Sữa Mộc Tiên
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
Lợi Sữa Mộc Tiên

Lợi sữa Mộc Tiên 100% thảo dược 2018 được kế thừa từ bài thuốc bắc Mộc Tiên ra đời năm 2017 đã được hơn 50 000 bà mẹ sử dụng và gọi sữa về thành công

Loi Sua Moc Tien is a medicinal tea product aimed at mothers who want to increase their breast milk production naturally. This product can be widely found on the Vietnamese version of Shopee and on BIBABO’s ecommerce platform

Client

BIBABO

Project Date

2018

Category

Graphic Design · Logo/Branding · Printed Media

Share This

View Project

The Logos

Here’s some real photos of the end product taken by the client. the print lab screwed up the background a little bit, duplicating the mountain, by the time we realize it, 3000 labels had been printed, so I guess this is how it’s supposed to look now

item.title: (2017) Run 4 Life Game Elements
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
Wandering Dragon Game Title

Run 4 Life is an endless running game based on King of the Jungle. Designed for the iPad It was one of the 3 game in Project Trinity.

I was only involved in the very early alpha stage of this game. I created a few concept mockups for the game (mostly based on the game Aliens Drive Me Crazy by Rebel Twins).

Character design: Loan Nguyen aka. Sakura Black Cat

In-game background artworks: Hanh Nguyen aka Zackpyo

Game Title Art & UI Elements & Game Over background artworks: Nam Vu

Client

Punch Entertainment Vietnam

Project Date

2017

Category

Graphic Design · Logo/Branding · Mobile · User Interfaces

Share This

Title Screen

Running Screen

Death Screen (with retries)

Game Over Screen

Some design progress for the game title art and UI elements:

item.title: (2016) Marvel: War of Heroes (Nexus) Horizontal UI
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.content:encoded:
Marvel: War of Heroes Nexus (horizontal)

I revived the Nexus project a year after its demise, as a UI study project.

I always feel like the original Nexus had so much more potential, and it was unfortunate it was birthed at the time when Marvel: War of Heroes was already at its sunset

Client

DeNA & Marvel Entertainment

Project Date

2016

Category

Graphic Design · Mobile · User Interfaces

Share This
